title: Most valuable Swiss watch brands worldwide 2016
summary: This bar chart has 16 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million CHF in each Brand on the y axis.
Brand Rolex has the highest Brand value in million CHF and Rado has the lowest Brand value in million CHF.
The highest Brand Rolex has 7052.0 more Brand value in million CHF than the lowest Brand Rado.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million CHF for 16 number of Brands.
The maximum Brand value in million CHF 7387.0 is found at Brand Rolex and the minimum is found at Rado where Brand is 335.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 16 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million CHF in each Brand on the y axis.
Brand Rolex has the highest Brand value in million CHF and Rado has the lowest Brand value in million CHF.
The highest Brand Rolex has 7052.0 more Brand value in million CHF than the lowest Brand Rado.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Brand value in million CHF in the y axis.
The Brand value in million CHF is highest at Brand Rolex and lowest at Brand Rado.
There is a difference of 7052.0 between the maximum Brand Rolex and minimum Brand Rado.
Brand Rolex is higher than any other Brands with value 7387.0, followed by Omega, and Patek Philippe. Down to Brand Rado with the lowest value 335.0.
The highest value 7387.0 at Rolex is almost 5.17 times larger than the average value 1427.5.
The Brand value in million CHF is 22840.0 if we add up values of all Brands.
